description:
This library module provides phonetic string similarity functions, comparing strings with basis on how they sound.

These metrics are particularly effective in matching names, since names are often spelled in different ways that sound the same.

The logic contained in this module is not specific to any particular XQuery implementation.

functions.name: metaphone-key
functions.description:
Returns the Metaphone key for a given string.

The Metaphone algorithm produces variable length keys as its output, as opposed to Soundex's fixed-length keys.

Example usage : 

metaphone-key("ALEKSANDER")

The function invocation in the example above returns : 

"ALKSNTR"
functions.summary: Returns the Metaphone key for a given string.

returns.description: The Metaphone key for the given input string.

functions.name: metaphone
functions.signature: ($s1 as xs:string, $s2 as xs:string) as xs:boolean
functions.description:
Checks if two strings have the same Metaphone key.

Example usage : 

metaphone("ALEKSANDER", "ALEXANDRE")

The function invocation in the example above returns : 

true
functions.summary: Checks if two strings have the same Metaphone key.

returns.description: Returns true if both strings have the same Metaphone key and false otherwise.

functions.name: soundex-key
functions.description:
Returns the Soundex key for a given string.

Example usage : 

soundex-key("Robert")

The function invocation in the example above returns : 

"R163"
functions.summary: Returns the Soundex key for a given string.

returns.description: The Soundex key for the given input string.

functions.name: soundex
functions.signature: ($s1 as xs:string, $s2 as xs:string) as xs:boolean
functions.description:
Checks if two strings have the same Soundex key.

Example usage : 

soundex( "Robert" , "Rupert" )

The function invocation in the example above returns : 

true
functions.summary: Checks if two strings have the same Soundex key.

returns.description: Returns true if both strings have the same Soundex key and false otherwise.
